description: Balco Group AB engages in the provision of balcony solutions. The company is headquartered in Vaxjo, Kronoberg and currently employs 440 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2017-10-06. The firm primarily offers customized balcony solutions under its own brand to tenant-owner associations, private landlords, the public housing sector and construction companies. The company mainly delivers glazed balconies and balcony solutions, primarily on the renovation market and to tenant-owner associations. The firm is specialized in replacing existing balconies with new glazed balconies in accordance with the so called Balco-method. The company operates on its Main Markets, which comprise Sweden, Denmark and Norway, as well as on its Other Markets, which comprise Germany, Finland, the United Kingdom and the Netherlands.
naics: Foundation, Structure, and Building Exterior Contractors
name: Balco Group AB
